boardgame.name: Bring Your Own Book
boardgame.description: Your old favorite book is now your new favorite game! In Bring Your Own Book, players take turns drawing prompts from the deck, then race to find the best phrase in their own book that satisfies the prompt. What's the tastiest _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;name for a candy bar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; in that history textbook you're reading for school? How quickly can you find _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;lyrics from a country western song_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; in your dog-training guide? What kind of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;advice for graduating seniors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; will appear in your anthology of limericks?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In more detail, everyone has their own book and sits in a circle. The cards are placed face down, and the starting player has a one-minute timer. The starting player takes the top card off the deck, picks a prompt, and reads it aloud. Everyone except the Picker searches their book for text to match the prompt, sequential text of any length: a single word, half of a sentence, a whole sentence, multiple sentences, etc._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The first Seeker to find matching text announces _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;I've got it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and starts the timer. When the timer runs out (or every Seeker announces _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;I've got it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;), each Seeker reads what they've found. Seekers who didn't find text in time open to a random page and read a random sentence from it. The Picker chooses their favorite submission and awards the card to that Reader. After each round, the person to the left of the last Picker starts the next round. Once any player holds three cards, everyone passes their book to the player on their left. This happens any time a player reaches three cards during the game. Thus, it can happen as many times as there are players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game proceeds until one player has collected the required number of cards and wins: with 5-7 players the first to 4 cards win; with 3-4 players the first to 5 cards win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Ask for exact shipping cost. Most go USPS and 2/3 Day Priority can be under 10.00 depending on zip. We can also check Fed Ex and UPS. Fed Ex can be cheaper when going to a business address.
Brand new, in shrink. Kickstarter version. Will ship to continental US via USPS priority mail.
This item is intended for user mykidsdad, winner in the New Baby action.
In very good condition, only played once and well looked after. Postage dependent on location. Paypal fees added.
$6 shipping Played once. Smoke/pet free household. Box may have shelf-wear.
